title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Red & White Fleet
price: Bay Cruise: Adults $22, children/teens (5-17) $16. Sunset Cruise: Adult (18+) $48; and Youth (5-17) $34. SF Explorer Cruise: Adults $34, children/teens (5-17) $22
content: They offer a 1 hour "Golden Gate Bay Cruise" which goes under the Golden Gate Bridge and around Alcatraz, a 2 hour "California Sunset Cruise" which goes around Angel Island, and a 90-minute "SF Explorer Cruise" which goes under the Bay Bridge toward SoMa.
